overview.en: Energy Aggregator Chain, the full name of Energy Aggregator Chain, is a blockchain interaction protocol based on blockchain technology. Different types of energy assets (equity, claims, income rights, especially carbon emission rights) running on EA. Through the agreement, the chain can be confirmed, freely exchanged, quickly circulated, and divided and exchanged; EA not only represents the owner's right to use energy in distributed energy storage equipment, but also can map future energy industry and clean energy industry. Ownership. EA will cut through the traditional energy sector to promote and empower the development and advancement of clean energy. #imToken# #4447# We are improving the information about EA (Energy Aggregator Chain) tokens in imToken. After completion, you can see logo in imToken, which makes it easier to manage Energy Aggregator Chain and more information about tokens.
overview.zh: 能量聚合链是一种依托区块链技术而生成的区块链交互协议，运行在链上的不同类型能源资产（股权、债权、收益权、尤其是碳排放权）等可以通过该协议上链确权，自由交换，快速流通，分割交互；EA不仅代表了持有人拥有分布式储能设备里能源的使用权，更是一种能映射未来能源产业以及清洁能源产业的所有权。EA将通过传统能源领域切入，推动和赋能清洁能源的发展和进步。#imToken# #4447#我们正在完善 EA（Energy Aggregator Chain） 在 imToken 中的代币相关资料。完成后，大家可以在 imToken 里看到 logo，更方便地管理 Energy Aggregator Chain，同时能看到更多代币信息.
